title: E342 Roman Atwood On Quitting YouTube, Surviving Stalker FBI Raid, Having 3 Wives
itunes:title: Roman Atwood On Quitting YouTube, Surviving Stalker FBI Raid, Having 3 Wives
description:
Amassing over 5B views & 15M subscribers, YouTube legend Roman Atwood joins the boys to discuss the FBI forcing him to leave YouTube (dangerous stalker), fake gold-digger pranks, becoming Mormon & having 3 wives, making $20M in merch, daily vlogging for 5 years straight, best prank he’s ever pulled off, spending $700k on a chopper, love for the Paul Brothers & more…

Visit https://www.manscaped.com/ and use the discount code LOGAN at checkout
